title: Weather Forecast August 7
content:
Source: Pakistan Meterological Department : 07 August 2021, 10:30
Synoptic Situation
Monsoon currents are still penetrating upper and central parts of the country and likely to continue in upper parts during next few days. A weak westerly wave is also present over western and upper parts of the country.Saturday
Hot and humid weather is likely to prevail over most parts of the country. However, more rain-wind/thundershower is expected in Kashmir, upper/central Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Gilgit-Baltistan during evening/night hours.Sunday
Hot and humid weather is likely to prevail over most parts of the country. However, more rain-wind/thundershower is expected in Kashmir, upper/central Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Gilgit-Baltistan during morning and evening/night hours.Past 24 Hour Weather
Weather remained hot and humid in most parts of the country. However, 27mm rain was recorded in Parachinar (Khyber Pakhtunkhwa).Yesterday’s highest maximum Temperature’s (°C): Turbat 44, Dalbandin & Nokkundi 43.Source: Pakistan Meterological Department : 07 August 2021, 10:30
